Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Piece
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object implements ChessPiece
Abstract class representing a chess piece.
